An arrow, pointing left.

See the glossary for information on the term black in unicode character names.
components.title: Leftwards Black Arrow

description:
An arrow, pointing left.

See the glossary for information on the term black in unicode character names.
title: Leftwards Black Arrow

version.description: The following characters we added to Unicode in 2003 and given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Arrows -> White and black arrows
emoji_net_data.definition: An arrow, pointing left. See the glossary for information on the term¬†black¬†in unicode character names. Left Arrow was approved as part of U http://emojipedia.org/leftwards-black-arrow/
emoji_net_data.name: left arrow

bn:00097938a: Related to or located at the back

bn:00113808a: Situated or lying in or toward the west; westward.
Situated in or facing or moving toward the west

bn:00107791a: Just preceding something else in time or order
Occurring before something else, either in time or order.
Prior; occurring before something else, either in time or order.

bn:00105834a: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north
The opposite of right; toward the west when one is facing north.
The west side of the body when one is facing north.

bn:00088912v: Change location; move, travel, or proceed, also metaphorically
To change (from one value to another).
To move or travel (from one location to another).
To change the location of an object.
To transfer a file from one location to another. After the file is transferred, there is only one copy of the file, in the new location.
To move an object one pixel at a time.

bn:13688589v: To move to the west; (of the sun) to set.

bn:00005896n: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

bn:17379710n: The key on the keyboard that is labeled with a left arrow.
